items.question: How does billing work?
items.answer: After the 1-hour free period, you will be billed monthly. Payment is made via credit card or other available methods.

items.question: Can I cancel at any time?
items.answer: Yes, you can cancel anytime via WhatsApp. There is no minimum commitment period or cancellation fees.

items.question: What happens if I don't pay?
items.answer: After 10 days without payment, the service is terminated and data is automatically deleted.

items.question: Is there technical support?
items.answer: Yes, we offer technical support via WhatsApp 24/7 through our AI assistant.

items.question: Can I request custom applications?
items.answer: Yes, besides standard applications, we can fulfill specific requests. Prices and availability upon request.

items.question: How do I receive access?
items.answer: You'll receive credentials and access URLs directly on WhatsApp as soon as your application is ready.
